::DarkMouse::

She realized it had been a very long time since Scorponok had left for the 
ship.
"Gee, I hope he makes it back here in one piece."
She wondered about Quickstrike.  She shook her head.
"Not a snowballs chance in an inferno. Not him or anybot for that matter."
She just finished the computaions for the hatch.  She went and fixed up an 
old door brought over from the ship and made it fit the hatch way.  Next she 
used a crane to hold up the door while she welded it to it's hinges and 
finished the job by putting foleage on and around the door.  No one would be 
able to spot it as an escape tunnel from the outside.  It was completely 
camoflaged.  She was proud of her work on this.
She opened up a commlink to Megatron.

"Commander, I have finished one tunnel and it's entrance.  I shall start on 
the other shortly."
She went back inside and went to her computer and looked at her notes for 
another tunnel.
